channel.title: NEED CODER he gets co-owner
channel.description:
Coder gets the server pack ITS F'ING SWEET MAN i was on it .. its soo freaking sweet .. so they get a copy of the server, and they gotta put it up .. on no-ip.com please .. i dont wanna cuz i still dont get it much (please dont post about me not knowing that)
so heres a list of things they gotta know and do
1)They have to know how to change the stuff when u log in 2)They cannot mess up the server please or i'll be very sad :( 3)They have to make a no-ip.com one to get my server up for other ppl 4)They gotta know how to run the server 5)They arnt just Coder they are my Co-Owner we keep going till we sell server 6)They have to post on the server thing .. so we get more players 7)Now this is a must .. HAVE MSN 8)We ARNT DOING HAMACHI SERVER .. more ppl would log on from the other thing 9)I have done all commands .. theres 150 new updates, not done by me 10)They have to have a nice running computer .. somtimes leave server running all night 11)Well thats about it .. please post .. i dont really read Pms much because .. i just dont .. well please help me out
Oh and DONT BE A FAG AND BACKOUT ON ME!!! THX
